content: make this cute and easy owl within an hour with this easy to follow crochet pattern the pattern is available for free on my blog in english and dutch and also availabe as a pdf download in my ravelry store you will need 1 ball of yarn for this owl or 2 if you want to use two shades you will also need scraps of white yarn for the eyes and the beak for each owl i used 2 balls of painbox yarn and just scraps for the rest i also used safety eyes in various sizes
